author: Jennings Stockton Cox
description: Light and refreshing. No one flavour predominates - sweet and sour are in harmony with the rum.
name: Daiquiri (on-the-rocks)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
